page.description: You can alter the HTML in the no records message using the 'No records HTML' property.

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to the No records HTML property opens the HTML editor. Here you can alter the font type, size, color, and text of the message.
You can also use the HTML Editor load an image as the message.

figure.title: Adding an image to the Project
Using an image for the 'no records'' message
